title: Why did i get low priority q?
body: In the last 200 games roughly i decided to leave a game as i had things to attend to so why did i get a low priority q for 5 games now? Riot Games you have played me like a {{champion:9}} Its not like i do anything wrong so why do i get this punishment? ):

replies.body:
Hey there,

Was this a ranked game that you decided to leave from?

Ranked games are treated more serious by the Leaverbuster system than other matchmade games.
